idea-plugin.name: Base16 Gotham
idea-plugin.vendor: Andrea Leopardi (arranged by Brett Jones), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Gotham for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Andrea Leopardi (arranged by Brett Jones). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
